p: As shown in Figure 1 and Table 1, other lipids including phytosphingosine (peak 4, RT 19.42 min, [M+H] + at m/z 318), dimethyl-safingol (peak 15, RT 24.98, [M+H] + at m/z 330), and phospholipid (peak 44, RT 35.48 min, [Mâˆ’22] + at m/z 553) were also tentatively identified in the oil and oleoresin. Due to the tentative identification of lipids being performed based on monoisotopic masses, we could not identify the type of phospholipid detected in the fat samples. Nevertheless, sphinganine (peak 6 of Figure 1, RT 22.13 min, [M+H] + at m/z 302) was detected in CO oil. Based on the relative abundance values of the MS spectra, these lipids were the minor compounds detected in the CO oil and oleoresin.
